name: Campfire Night
description:
This is a part of my "Bored Games" series, I make random games/experiences to learn new code or just a stupid idea that comes to mind.

Story: I like to listen to a piece of music I haven't heard before and think of the feelings it makes me feel and then create an experience for that feeling or a nice settings to listen to the music.

Controls:

Alt+F4 to close the game.

Music: Tomorrow & Better Days – Bensound.com
